com.conichi.sdk.key

Class DoorlockException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.conichi.sdk.key.DoorlockException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoorlockSdkException

    public class DoorlockException
extends java.lang.Exception
    DoorlockException represents an error happened while interacting with a doorlock unit or scanning for a doorlock.
    See Also:
